```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
## This report requires summary files form mothur

require(knitr)
require(kableExtra)
require(SummarizedExperiment)
require(webshot)
require(htmlwidgets)
debug <- FALSE
setEnvironments("phantomjs")
```

```{r prepare data, include=FALSE}
### rawDataSummary 
rawSummaryTable <- createSummaryTable(rawSummaryFile)
mappedAndHomopFilteredSummaryTable <- createSummaryTable(mappedAndHomopFilteredSummaryFile)
preClusteredAndChimeraFilteredSummaryTable <- createSummaryTable(preClusteredAndChimeraFilteredSummaryFile)
```

Started on `r format(Sys.time(), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")`

## Mothur Data Clean {.tabset}

### Summary of the raw reads
```{r setting, echo=FALSE}
kable(rawSummaryTable, row.names=TRUE, 
      col.names=TRUE, format="html") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = F,
                position = "left")
```

### Reads filtered by mapping coordinates and Homopolymers
```{r setting, echo=FALSE}
kable(mappedAndHomopFilteredSummaryTable, row.names=TRUE, 
      col.names=TRUE, format="html") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = F,
                position = "left")
```

### Reads preclusterd and filtered for chimeras
```{r setting, echo=FALSE}
kable(preClusteredAndChimeraFilteredSummaryTable, row.names=TRUE, 
      col.names=TRUE, format="html") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = F,
                position = "left")
```
